title: Stunning goal knocks reigning champions Portugal out of Euro 2020
In Ohio, Trump supporters refuse to accept truth about January 6
description: CNN's Donie O'Sullivan was on the scene at former President Donald Trump's rally in Wellington, Ohio, where he spoke with diehard supporters who remain convinced that Trump won the 2020 election (he didn't) and claim that Democrats and the FBI are to blame for the Capitol insurrection (they aren't).

title: 'Trump deserves to go to jail': Ex-Trump Organization exec on possible criminal charges
description: Barbara Res, former executive vice president for the Trump Organization, talks with CNN's Jim Acosta about the possibility of New York prosecutors filing criminal charges against her former employer.

title: Brian Stelter watched an entire week of Fox News. Here's what he found
description: CNN's Brian Stelter says the content coming from pro-Trump media, led by Fox News host Sean Hannity, softens the ground for conspiracies and makes their audience comfortable with violence.

title: How China views the future
description: Elizabeth Economy, Rana Mitter, Jiayang Fan and Fareed on what lies ahead for China as it celebrates the one hundredth anniversary of its ruling party.

title: New video of Ethiopia massacre shows soldiers passing phone around to document their executions of unarmed men
description: A few scattered human bones lay on the rocky ground, along with a broken skull and several half-burned identification cards.

title: Family says they found grandmother's photos, birthday card in debris
description: Michael Noriega, whose 92-year-old grandmother is among the missing in the Surfside, Florida, condo collapse, says his family found photos and a birthday card belonging to his grandmother shortly after arriving on scene.

title: Cruising was a Covid disaster. Now it claims to be the 'safest vacation available'
description: The world's cruise ships were once titans of the oceans, raking in billions in profit as their city-sized passenger populations traveled across the globe.

title: Turkish police fire tear gas to disperse Pride march in Istanbul
description: Turkish police fired tear gas to disperse a crowd that gathered for a Pride parade in central Istanbul on Saturday, detaining some of those seeking to take part in an event banned by local authorities.

title: Sidelined in this year's Pride March, NYPD officers speak out
description: When NYPD Commissioner Dermot Shea took the podium Thursday to address this year's preparations for New York's Pride weekend, his comments were tinged with disappointment and pride for his own.

title: 1 person is dead after a small plane crashed into a Utah home
description: The pilot of a small airplane was killed when it crashed into a home in North Logan, Utah, Saturday night, according to authorities.

title: Some families frustrated by pace of search in Florida building collapse
description:
• LIVE UPDATES: Death toll rises to five as body found in rubble
• 'It's not enough!': Frustrated mom lashes out at officials

title: Their ancestors were enslaved workers. Now they're getting $2,100 a year in reparations
description: Linda Johnson-Thomas' grandfather worked at the Virginia Theological Seminary for more than a decade, first as a farm laborer before moving up to head janitor.

title: How sexy blue aliens invaded Amazon's bestseller lists
description: There are some things that cannot be properly explained within the lines of your average news website. "Ice Planet Barbarians" is one of those things.

title: Pride is a parenting opportunity
description: I work with a remarkable teenager who is figuring out where she fits in the LGBTQ+ community. Meanwhile, her mother is earnestly pressing her to dress and behave more "normal" and "straight."

title: Trump's big lie about 2020 results suffers legal and political blows in key swing states
description: It was a bad week for the Big Lie -- former President Donald Trump and his allies' false claims that widespread fraud is to blame for his 2020 election loss.

title: Released American journalist says Myanmar military using torture to hunt down opposition leaders
Trump kicks off revenge tour with eyes on one Ohio Republican
description: Donald Trump on Saturday will kick off his revenge tour against Republicans who defied him in the aftermath of the 2020 election and January 6 insurrection, hoping to convince his supporters to fire Ohio Rep. Anthony Gonzalez.

title: Wimbledon 2021: Everything you need to know about the tennis championships
description: The sight of courts covered in luscious, green grass and fans watching as they savor strawberries and cream can only mean one thing: Wimbledon is here.

title: In this Chinese tower block, residents pay to take the lift home
description: In 2001, when their old home was demolished to make way for a new thoroughfare, Wang Zhenyuan and his wife didn't mind that their replacement apartment was a seventh-floor walkup.  They were in their fifties and fit.
